content.$t: quote: I have learned so much and will take back to my classroom a new excitement and love of the ocean. I will be able to introduce my students to what it means to be a scientist at sea and how what we learn in the classroom translates to what they can do in the future., tn: https://teacheratsea.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/img_0788.jpg

gsx$quote.$t: I have learned so much and will take back to my classroom a new excitement and love of the ocean. I will be able to introduce my students to what it means to be a scientist at sea and how what we learn in the classroom translates to what they can do in the future.

content.$t: quote: Over the past couple of weeks, I have learned so much.  My voyage on the Bering Sea is quickly coming to an end.  The science team, NOAA Corps, and crew have been wonderful to work with during my time at sea.  This has truly been an experience of a lifetime., tn: https://teacheratsea.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/noaa-tas-july-5th-and-6th-onboard-091.jpg

gsx$quote.$t: Over the past couple of weeks, I have learned so much.  My voyage on the Bering Sea is quickly coming to an end.  The science team, NOAA Corps, and crew have been wonderful to work with during my time at sea.  This has truly been an experience of a lifetime.

content.$t: quote: I am so grateful for this experience and this remarkable program that NOAA has in place to provide such research experiences for teachers.  I truly believe that the future of STEM-related jobs in the United States depends on programs like this to develop tomorrow’s scientists and engineers., tn: http://teacheratsea.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/100_0045.jpg

gsx$quote.$t: I am so grateful for this experience and this remarkable program that NOAA has in place to provide such research experiences for teachers.  I truly believe that the future of STEM-related jobs in the United States depends on programs like this to develop tomorrow’s scientists and engineers.

content.$t: quote: The life of a sailor/scientist was an incredible experience and I am excited to share all that I have learned with my students at West Genesee.  Many thanks go out to the Captain and crew of the R/V Sharp and the NOAA science staff for making my journey unforgettable., tn: http://teacheratsea.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/dscf0392.jpg

gsx$quote.$t: The life of a sailor/scientist was an incredible experience and I am excited to share all that I have learned with my students at West Genesee.  Many thanks go out to the Captain and crew of the R/V Sharp and the NOAA science staff for making my journey unforgettable.

content.$t: quote: It is an amazing amount of sadness I feel, leaving this incredible ship with its incredible crew.  Although my physical time on the ship is complete, I know the experience I’ve had will continue to inform my teaching and allow me to educate others about NOAA and the “what” and “why” of hydrographic surveying., tn: http://teacheratsea.files.wordpress.com/2014/09/shipselfie2.jpg

gsx$quote.$t: It is an amazing amount of sadness I feel, leaving this incredible ship with its incredible crew.  Although my physical time on the ship is complete, I know the experience I’ve had will continue to inform my teaching and allow me to educate others about NOAA and the “what” and “why” of hydrographic surveying.

content.$t: quote: I have learned so much in these two short weeks, I want to stay and keep learning.  I will take with me all that I have learned about the complexity of the ocean planet we live on and share my thirst to know more back to the classroom where we can continue our work., tn: http://teacheratsea.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/p1000263.jpg

gsx$quote.$t: I have learned so much in these two short weeks, I want to stay and keep learning.  I will take with me all that I have learned about the complexity of the ocean planet we live on and share my thirst to know more back to the classroom where we can continue our work.

content.$t: quote: In the middle of nine people quickly hauling in countless sharpnose sharks, calling out data and moving around fishing gear the female hammer-head rotated one her eyes to look directly at me.  At that moment I could feel/sense how people, the ocean and its inhabitants are all inextricably connected., tn: http://teacheratsea.files.wordpress.com/2014/08/img_30101.jpg

gsx$quote.$t: In the middle of nine people quickly hauling in countless sharpnose sharks, calling out data and moving around fishing gear the female hammer-head rotated one her eyes to look directly at me.  At that moment I could feel/sense how people, the ocean and its inhabitants are all inextricably connected.

content.$t: quote: I feel very fortunate to have been chosen to be a NOAA Teacher at Sea. I have learned so much about fishery research and ocean floor mapping. I am happy to have played a small role in collecting this important data.   I can’t wait to share this knowledge with my students., tn: http://teacheratsea.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/kevin-mcmahon-with-suckerfish-in-wetlab.jpg

gsx$quote.$t: I feel very fortunate to have been chosen to be a NOAA Teacher at Sea. I have learned so much about fishery research and ocean floor mapping. I am happy to have played a small role in collecting this important data.   I can’t wait to share this knowledge with my students.

content.$t: quote: I loved being with new people, learning from them, getting to know the lifestyle of sailors, being an insider on how my country is involved in the global science initiatives with climate research, and gaining a whole different context of living and learning. , tn: http://teacheratsea.files.wordpress.com/2012/05/dscn0997.jpg

gsx$quote.$t: I loved being with new people, learning from them, getting to know the lifestyle of sailors, being an insider on how my country is involved in the global science initiatives with climate research, and gaining a whole different context of living and learning.

content.$t: quote: The ability to be such an integral part of a scientific research team was very important.  It made me feel like I could more easily bring the feel of doing "real" research into the classroom., tn: http://teacheratsea.files.wordpress.com/2012/06/dscn0267.jpg

gsx$quote.$t: The ability to be such an integral part of a scientific research team was very important.  It made me feel like I could more easily bring the feel of doing "real" research into the classroom.

content.$t: quote: This has been a rich experience for me that I will never forget.  Memories of trying to walk normally on a rocking ship to getting within 15 feet of a right what, and working with these dedicated people will be with me for the rest of my life., tn: http://teacheratsea.files.wordpress.com/2012/05/dscn2788.jpg

gsx$quote.$t: This has been a rich experience for me that I will never forget.  Memories of trying to walk normally on a rocking ship to getting within 15 feet of a right what, and working with these dedicated people will be with me for the rest of my life.

content.$t: quote: Just as people are interconnected to the ocean they are also interconnected to each other. All of the people I met on this adventure worked together toward a common purpose.  They (reached their goal) by doing their best work and trusting each member of the group. Effort and communication was the key to their success., tn: http://teacheratsea.files.wordpress.com/2012/08/blue-as-far-as-you-can-see.jpeg

gsx$quote.$t: Just as people are interconnected to the ocean they are also interconnected to each other. All of the people I met on this adventure worked together toward a common purpose.  They (reached their goal) by doing their best work and trusting each member of the group. Effort and communication was the key to their success.

content.$t: quote: Being a Teacher at Sea has been an experience of a lifetime. I learned so much about life at sea and studies in marine science. I am eager to share this experience with students and staff alike.  I hope to spark a new passion in students and excitement in staff to explore this opportunity from NOAA.” , tn: http://teacheratsea.files.wordpress.com/2012/07/img_0230.jpg

gsx$quote.$t: Being a Teacher at Sea has been an experience of a lifetime. I learned so much about life at sea and studies in marine science. I am eager to share this experience with students and staff alike.  I hope to spark a new passion in students and excitement in staff to explore this opportunity from NOAA.”

content.$t:
quote: I feel that my passion for the sciences has been re‐ignited. I
found myself craving more knowledge after 7 years in the
classroom with stagnant curriculum. This has totally revamped my
creativity and love for the natural world.....passion is contagious., tn: http://teacheratsea.files.wordpress.com/2011/08/bering-08-27-11-0361.jpg

gsx$quote.$t:
I feel that my passion for the sciences has been re‐ignited. I
found myself craving more knowledge after 7 years in the
classroom with stagnant curriculum. This has totally revamped my
creativity and love for the natural world.....passion is contagious.

content.$t:
quote: “This experience was truly once‐in‐a‐lifetime. I was a part of a
research team that had a very impactful job to do...I was able to perform tasks as
if I was scientist and interact with the ship's crew a scientist, and interact with the ship s crew, learning
more and doing things outside of being a guest scientist.
, tn: http://teacheratsea.files.wordpress.com/2011/07/dsc02597.jpg

gsx$quote.$t:
“This experience was truly once‐in‐a‐lifetime. I was a part of a
research team that had a very impactful job to do...I was able to perform tasks as
if I was scientist and interact with the ship's crew a scientist, and interact with the ship s crew, learning
more and doing things outside of being a guest scientist.

content.$t:
quote: I use NOAA resources in my classroom on a regular basis for
hands on and data driven activities. The opportunity to see
and assist in the hands on collection of that data has proven
to be an immeasurable experience. , tn: http://teacheratsea.files.wordpress.com/2011/07/100_02311.jpg

gsx$quote.$t:
I use NOAA resources in my classroom on a regular basis for
hands on and data driven activities. The opportunity to see
and assist in the hands on collection of that data has proven
to be an immeasurable experience.

content.$t:
quote: I feel I have more ‘tools’ or resources in
my toolbox in order to make my content
meaningful and exciting. I will be able to
incorporate this experience in ALL areas
of the curriculum, which is very exciting
and motivating. I don't think I have
actually learned this much since my
student teaching. , tn: http://teacheratsea.files.wordpress.com/2011/09/img_8740.jpg

gsx$quote.$t:
I feel I have more ‘tools’ or resources in
my toolbox in order to make my content
meaningful and exciting. I will be able to
incorporate this experience in ALL areas
of the curriculum, which is very exciting
and motivating. I don't think I have
actually learned this much since my
student teaching.

content.$t:
quote: The TAS program is a chance to experience real science at
work, in its complicated, interesting, and sometimes messy
form. No matter the experience, teachers get to DO science.
, tn: http://teacheratsea.files.wordpress.com/2011/08/p80700391.jpg

gsx$quote.$t:
The TAS program is a chance to experience real science at
work, in its complicated, interesting, and sometimes messy
form. No matter the experience, teachers get to DO science.
